tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to non-deterministic JSON unmarshalling in IBC acknowledgements, which can cause a chain halt. This issue affects `IBC-Go` versions `>= v7` and potentially earlier versions. Any user capable of opening an IBC channel can trigger this vulnerability, leading to network disruption. The latest patch extends protections to all applications beyond transfer.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/Cosmos/ibc-go/v8` library to the patch version. To prevent this state from being introduced to a chain, it is possible to permission Channel Opening as a workaround.
